name: Outreach Sales Engagement
description: Integrate with Outreach Sales Engagement to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Prospects
tools.description: List prospects from Outreach. Returns prospect names, emails, titles, and companies.

tools.name: Create Prospect
tools.description: Create a new prospect in Outreach. Provide at least an email address.

tools.name: List Sequences
tools.description: List email sequences from Outreach. Returns sequence names, states, and step counts.

tools.name: Add To Sequence
tools.description: Add a prospect to an Outreach sequence. Creates a sequence state linking the prospect to the sequence.

tools.name: List Mailings
tools.description: List mailings (sent emails) from Outreach. Returns email subjects, states, and engagement metrics.
